original_text: I will punish the people who did not obey the agreement that they made with me. When they made that agreement, they cut a young cow into two pieces and they walked between the pieces. Because they have not obeyed their agreement, I will now cut them into pieces, like the young cow.
korean_text: 송아지를 둘로 쪼개고 그 두 조각 사이로 지나매 내 앞에 언약을 맺었으나 그 말을 실행하지 아니하여 내 계약을 어긴 그들을

sentences.original_text: who did not obey the agreement
they cut a young cow into two pieces
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 어린 송아지를 두 조각으로 잘랐다

sentences.original_text: and they walked between the pieces
Because they have not obeyed their agreement
I will now cut them into pieces
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이제 그들을 조각으로 잘라낼 것이다
